Go implementation for converting several China obfuscated GPS coordinate schemas back into the regular form (and vice versa).

Currently supported:
|*| WGS84 <-> GCJ02
|*| WGS84 <-> BD09 ("bd09ll")
|*| WGS84 <-> BD09MC
|*| GCJ02 <-> BD09 ("bd09ll")
|*| GCJ02 <-> BD09MC
|*| BD09 ("bd09ll") <-> BD09MC
